{"id":561817689,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1632748024,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"80 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/561817689/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"38.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPal(string s,int ind)\n    {\n        string tmp1=\"\";\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            if(i!=ind)\n            tmp1+=s[i];\n        }\n        string tmp2=tmp1;\n        reverse(tmp1.begin(),tmp1.end());\n        if(tmp1==tmp2)\n        return true;\n      \n            return false;\n    }\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n      int a=0;\n        int b=s.length()-1;\n        while(a<b)\n        {\n            if(s[a]!=s[b])\n            {\n                if(isPal(s,a)==true)\n                    return true;\n                if(isPal(s,b)==true)\n                    return true;\n                return false;\n            }\n            a++;\n            b--;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
